original_text: And the elders of Moab and the elders of Midian departed with the rewards of divination in their hand; and they came unto Balaam, and spake unto him the words of Balak.
korean_text: 모압 장로들과 미디안 장로들이 손에 복채를 가지고 떠나 발람에게 이르러 발락의 말을 그에게 전하매

sentences.original_text: and the elders of Midian departed
with the rewards of divination in their hand
and spake unto him the words of Balak
